name: Approaching Cao Army
description:
1'Approaching Cao Jun' is an easy-to-learn, grass-cutting type, fast-paced Three Kingdoms-themed movement combat game.
2 # In the game, you start by controlling a single hero,

3 # gradually expanding your team.

4 # Ultimately, you'll engage in a final battle against the enemy.

5 # You'll need to make good use of resources and items to strengthen your team.


6 # And, upgrade your team.


7 Throughout the process, you'll need to be agile, avoid enemy attacks, and pick up resources to strengthen your team. Some levels require you to evolve land by stomping on it after eliminating enemies, while others are purely about avoiding and attacking enemies.
8 Finally, you'll need to earn enough coins to permanently strengthen your troops. Unlocking all your heroes is also an excellent goal. With Cao's army pressing in, danger is imminent! Summon your heroes, brave warriors, and engage in an epic battle against the evil, corrupted forces of Cao's army!
